reuseList.title: Are you sure?
reuseList.message: Do you want to reuse this list of bills? You’ll be able to modify each bill’s values in "New Register" by clicking the "Bills" button

removeList.title: Are you sure?
removeList.message: Do you want to delete this list of bills? You won’t be able to view or reuse it

indicators.noData: No data. Go to "New Register" and add some bills :)
